perturbation.original_text: 4.9 The Reseller shall comply at all times with all applicable laws, rules, regulations, and industry standards relating to the storage, packaging, marketing, distribution, laboratory work, and sale of the Products in the Territory.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.9 The Reseller shall endeavor to comply with applicable laws, rules, regulations, and industry standards relating to the storage, packaging, marketing, distribution, laboratory work, and sale of the Products in the Territory.
perturbation.explanation: The modification replaces "shall comply" with "shall endeavor to comply". This weakens the obligation, making it less stringent and opening it to interpretation regarding the level of effort required. This creates an ambiguous legal obligation.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Israeli Consumer Protection Law (1981) and Public Health Regulations: These laws often require strict compliance with safety and health standards, especially regarding medical products. Using "endeavor to comply" could be interpreted as not requiring full compliance, thus violating these regulations.
